articles.title: Samsung's Wild-Looking Tri-Fold Phone Debuts at APEC Summit in South Korea - CNET
articles.description: The Galaxy phonemaker showed off a twin-hinged foldable at a Korean consumer tech show.
articles.content: Samsung unveiled its first triple-display foldable phone for consumers at a tech exhibition hall during the APEC CEO Summit in South Korea. The Korean publication Dailian reported that the new phone … [+2828 chars]

articles.title: Adobe and Google Cloud Expand Strategic Partnership to Advance the Future of Creative AI - Adobe Newsroom
articles.description: At Adobe MAX, Adobe and Google Cloud announced an expanded partnership to deliver the next generation of AI-powered creative technologies, bringing together Adobe’s decades of creative expertise with Google’s advanced AI models.
articles.content: At Adobe, were leading the way to ignite creativity for all in the AI era, said Shantanu Narayen, chair and chief executive officer, Adobe. Our partnership with Google Cloud brings together Adobes cr… [+1115 chars]
